text:
Hi, thanks for the reply. I have tried the Private Apps approach, but the Marketing API (*communication-preferences)* is not covered in the scope.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing-api/subscriptions-preferences>
I’ve tried the API endpoints above with my Private App Authorisation token, but I’m getting a not supported error:

Greetings! I wanted to ask if anybody knows of a delay in contact creation via the Tracking Code? We implemented the tracking code on the site and used the identify user but it didn't create the contact record immediately or shortly after the user was identified.

Hey guys.
I'm trying to extract data from HubSpot using <https://meltano.com/|Meltano>. The tool is asking for 4 fields:
• redirect_uri
• client_id
• client_secret
• refresh_token
Is there some specific way to get all those fields? Ex: create an app in the developer account, ....
